function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complexity of evaluating the risk of sars-cov-2 infection in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Routine disinfection timeframes not being followed for contacted surfaces and items","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher occupant density leading to increased physical contact and exposure to shared air","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of touchless operation technology for common office items and facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of respiratory virus transmission via interior surfaces due to occupant hand-surface contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne virus leakage from the drain due to poorly designed or maintained trap seal retention system.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic guidance for drainage system operation and maintenance for infection control.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory viruses via contaminated indoor surfaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission risk due to traditional hvac systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral aerosols transmitted via building drainage system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uvgi system due to location and operation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in upper-room uvgi systems efficiency with rising humidity levels","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through building heating systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of indoor surfaces in vast open spaces and shadowed areas such as bedrails and telephones in a ward.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concerns regarding occupants’ exposure to uv in upper-room uvgi systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence of upper-room uvgi system effectiveness on building parameters and system design.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential inefficacy of uvgi technology in disinfecting indoor air and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of in-duct uvgi systems due to ventilation system efficiency and fan capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diminished ability of uvgi to disinfect indoor surfaces in the presence of dirt and debris","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulation of pathogenic particles on ioniser and surrounding surfaces due to negative air ionisation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment and comparison of infection risk associated with lighting factors that reflect sunlight exposure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient assessment of the effectiveness of uvgi systems in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases in healthcare settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Air pressure controls affected by air leaks","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hazardous waste from filter disposal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of airflow rate caused by filters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated indoor noise levels from pac operation","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective placement of pacs leading to uneven air purification and particle removal in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective operation and maintenance of hepa filtration systems leading to reduced efficiency in particle removal and air purification.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Experimental studies with simulated aerosol particles in various indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed effects of combining ventilation and pacs in buildings with central ventilation systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty conveying comprehensive information that reflects uncertainty to the public","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public’s lack of understanding of professional knowledge about risks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public seeking unproven information or rumors due to uncertainty","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concealment of information by governments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consensus in expert judgments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interdisciplinary challenges in risk assessment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in deciding what information to disclose to the public","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of government decision-making on risk governance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of equivocal expressions in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specialized communication strategies for separate groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider audience perceptions and concerns in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate risk communication during an ongoing investigation of an unknown disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Silencing and punishing of ’rumormongers’ during the initial outbreak of an unknown disease","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public’s ignorance of self-protection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Politics being the most important issue restricting the voice of the academic community","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to establish networks of working relationships among individuals, groups, and agencies","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misleading information and panic buying of unproven medicines and protective equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding and perception of the outbreak leading to extreme behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exaggerated scientific claims leading to misinformation and lack of perception of risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
